# pixelsWideRange

**Instance Property**

The range of widths a model’s image feature accepts as input or produces as output.

## Declaration

```swift
var pixelsWideRange: NSRange { get }
```

## Accessing the image size ranges

- **pixelsHighRange**: The range of heights a model’s image feature accepts as input or produces as output.

items.description: The range of heights a model’s image feature accepts as input or produces as output.
